description: Returns an existing ruleset by identifier or name.

nested_items.name: Ruleset
nested_items.description: A Data Quality Definition Language (DQDL) ruleset. For more information, see the Glue developer guide.

nested_items.name: TargetTable
nested_items.description: The name and database name of the target table.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the Glue table.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database where the Glue table exists.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The catalog id where the Glue table exists.

nested_items.name: CreatedOn
nested_items.description: A timestamp. The time and date that this data quality ruleset was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedOn
nested_items.description: A timestamp. The last point in time when this data quality ruleset was modified.

nested_items.name: RecommendationRunId
nested_items.description: When a ruleset was created from a recommendation run, this run ID is generated to link the two together.

nested_items.name: DataQualitySecurityConfiguration
nested_items.description: The name of the security configuration created with the data quality encryption option.
